7404564_syn_2: OPERATIVE SUMMARY: [REDACTED] 76% obstruction of the Left Mainstem Bronchus due to thyroid malignancy. Under general anesthesia, a rigid bronchoscope was introduced. The microdebrider blade was utilized to shave and aspirate the endoluminal tumor component (CPT 31640). Multiple passes achieved significant luminal gain, resulting in 31% residual obstruction. Hemostasis was maintained.
